title: Solid Black
description: A truck driver, Rob, who lost his family a long time ago, tries to drive and keep to himself. He finds himself in a strange situation that requires him to seek out the knowledge and help of others; a demonic possession. He finds punk rockers, who are all helpful in their own ways. Over the course of the story, Rob learns to not only trust, but to help, and to love others.
author: Dale Terrell
